sentence: move the right purple block to the left side from the right side of the previously moved block
move the purple block nearest to the red block to the left side of the purple block next to it
align the rightmost purple block with the left side of the purple block you just moved
move the rightmost purple block to the left side of the other purple block next to it
pick up the purple block which is closest to the block you just moved and place it on the left side of the moved block
